metadata.title: General Abilities
metadata.description: Basic abilities available to all characters in everyday life

abilities.name: Animal Handling
abilities.description: The ability to work with and control animals.
abilities.advancement: Practice (working with animals daily), Training (from experienced handlers), Exposure (around animals)

abilities.name: Area Lore
abilities.description: Knowledge of a specific geographical region, its people, customs, and secrets.
abilities.advancement: Exposure (living in the area), Practice (exploring and socializing), Training (from local guides)
abilities.notes: Each region requires a separate Area Lore ability

abilities.name: Athletics
abilities.description: Physical fitness, coordination, and sporting activities.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular exercise), Training (from coaches), Exposure (active lifestyle)

abilities.name: Awareness
abilities.description: Noticing things in your environment and staying alert to danger.
abilities.advancement: Practice (staying alert), Training (from scouts), Exposure (dangerous environments)

abilities.name: Bargain
abilities.description: Negotiating prices and making deals in commercial transactions.
uses: Getting better prices when buying or selling
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular trading), Training (from merchants), Exposure (market environments)

abilities.name: Brawl
abilities.description: Fighting without weapons using fists, feet, and grappling.
abilities.advancement: Practice (sparring), Training (from fighters), Exposure (violent situations)

abilities.name: Carouse
abilities.description: Drinking, partying, and socializing in taverns and social gatherings.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular carousing), Training (from entertainers), Exposure (social environments)

abilities.name: Charm
abilities.description: Being likeable and persuasive in social situations.
abilities.advancement: Practice (socializing), Training (from courtiers), Exposure (social situations)

abilities.name: Chirurgy
abilities.description: Medical treatment of wounds and diseases without magic.
abilities.advancement: Practice (treating patients), Training (from physicians), Study (medical texts)

abilities.name: Craft
abilities.description: Creating and repairing items in a specific trade or craft.
abilities.advancement: Practice (daily crafting), Training (from masters), Study (technical manuals)
abilities.notes: Each craft requires a separate Craft ability

abilities.name: Folk Ken
abilities.description: Understanding people's motivations, emotions, and social dynamics.
uses: Knowing appropriate behavior for social class
abilities.advancement: Practice (people watching), Training (from courtiers), Exposure (diverse social situations)

abilities.name: Guile
abilities.description: Lying, deceiving, and manipulating others through cunning.
abilities.advancement: Practice (deception), Training (from con artists), Exposure (situations requiring deception)

abilities.name: Hunt
abilities.description: Tracking, hunting, and surviving in the wilderness.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular hunting), Training (from hunters), Exposure (wilderness living)

abilities.name: Intrigue
abilities.description: Understanding and participating in political schemes and court politics.
abilities.advancement: Practice (political involvement), Training (from courtiers), Exposure (political environments)

abilities.name: Leadership
abilities.description: Inspiring and commanding others to follow your direction.
abilities.advancement: Practice (leading groups), Training (from commanders), Exposure (leadership situations)

abilities.name: Legerdemain
abilities.description: Sleight of hand, pickpocketing, and manual dexterity tricks.
abilities.advancement: Practice (performing tricks), Training (from thieves), Exposure (criminal environments)

abilities.name: Living Language
abilities.description: Speaking and understanding a language currently in use.
abilities.advancement: Practice (daily use), Training (from native speakers), Exposure (immersion in language)
abilities.notes: Each language requires a separate ability. Score 5 = native fluency

abilities.name: Music
abilities.description: Playing musical instruments, singing, and composing music.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular playing), Training (from musicians), Study (musical theory)

abilities.name: Organization Lore
abilities.description: Knowledge of a specific organization's structure, customs, and secrets.
abilities.advancement: Practice (working with organization), Training (from members), Study (organizational documents)
abilities.notes: Each organization requires a separate Lore ability

abilities.name: Profession
abilities.description: Knowledge and skills related to a specific profession or trade.
abilities.advancement: Practice (working in profession), Training (from masters), Study (professional texts)
abilities.notes: Each profession requires a separate ability

abilities.name: Ride
abilities.description: Controlling and working with riding animals, especially horses.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular riding), Training (from riders), Exposure (mounted activities)

abilities.name: Stealth
abilities.description: Moving unseen and unheard, hiding from observation.
abilities.advancement: Practice (sneaking around), Training (from scouts), Exposure (dangerous situations)

abilities.name: Survival
abilities.description: Finding food, water, and shelter in the wilderness.
uses: Finding food and water in the wild
abilities.advancement: Practice (wilderness living), Training (from woodsmen), Exposure (outdoor life)

abilities.name: Swim
abilities.description: Moving through water and surviving aquatic environments.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular swimming), Training (from swimmers), Exposure (aquatic environments)

abilities.name: Teaching
abilities.description: Instructing others and helping them learn new skills.
abilities.advancement: Practice (regular teaching), Training (from educators), Study (pedagogical methods)
